thread.title: Steven

author: Steven
title: Steven
text: Superb service , i booked my two hour time slot and was informed of a problem in plenty of time and given a new slot on the same day and had my Â£14.99 (charge for booking time slot) refunded as a member of staff was off sick , the fitter Steve Hughes rang me to tell me what time he would be with me and when he arrived ,at the time he told me ,was very professional and quick. I will certainly be using this service again.
